content:
The formatting for some of the stuff in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/master/cranelift/docs/ir.md seems to be broken(blocks listing the grammar, images). It looks like the markdown file was converted from an org-mode file.

Can I create a PR to make fixes for these? Or is there any reason to keep it the way it is?

bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Standalone JIT-style runtime for WebAssembly, using Cranelift - bytecodealliance/wasmtime
Yeah, it was converted, and yes, PRs to improve it would be welcome!
It was actually converted from a ReStructuredText file, not an org-mode.
